features: ✔ OPTIMIZE PH BALANCE… vH essentials’ fragrance free and hypoallergenic wash may support vaginal health by balancing pH levels, cleansing sensitive skin and helping combat feminine odor.
✔ MULTI-ACTION FORMULA … Prebiotics support healthy vaginal flora, tea tree oil and vH Microbalance are an odor-blocking, neutralizing blend.

✔ NATURAL INGREDIENTS … Our hypoallergenic wash is infused with tea tree oil, prebiotics, natural botanical extracts and vitamins. It contains no parabens, gluten, artificial colors/dyes, or animal byproducts.
✔ FEMININE CARE SUPPORT… Our daily cleanser soothes and helps fight intimate odor. It can be used for all-over body care to keep you feeling clean and balanced.
✔ DOWN-THERE CARE… Infused with natural botanical extracts and vitamins, our Daily Feminine Wash helps restore your wellbeing and confidence. It’s feminine care that works!
body.description: Feel clean and confident with vH essentials Hypoallergenic & Fragrance Free Daily Intimate Feminine Wash. Fortified with a vH Microbalance, this feminine cleansing wash helps banish unwanted and unpleasant vaginal odor. Gently cleanse sensitive intimate areas with a mixture of tea tree oil, prebiotics (fructo-oligosaccharides), lactic acid. This paraben free feminine wash is cruelty-free and contains no artificial colors or dyes, or animal byproducts. Take control of your feminine hygiene with this gentle, daily vaginal wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very affordable! and efficient
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried a new daily feminine wash and I’m so glad I did! The product is gentle on my skin and provides a light, pleasant scent that doesn’t overpower. It also leaves my skin feeling moisturized and refreshed all day long. Love the peppermint smell. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a safe, effective way to keep their intimate area clean and fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This soap is so gentle yet effective. It doesn't have a smell to me but I can get just a hint of tea tree scent if I try to smell the soap. All in all this keeps my female hygiene up to par and then some. No discomfort with this, it seems to be made w all natural ingredients, and a little goes a long way! When I received this product, it was sealed/no leakage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: V wash works great! Unscented and works well for sensitive area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have struggled with sweating and an odor down there for a couple of years now. With that being said, it has made me self conscious about the smell for a little while and I'm always looking for nice products that don't irritate my skin. I apply using my fingers and leave this on for a few minutes before rinsing off and have noticed a huge difference! I feel like the effects last at least 24 hours, if not a full 2 days. I feel much cleaner down there and have noticed major improvements! I have only purchased one bottle (4 months ago) and I'm only about 3/4 of the way thru it so it also lasts a long time if you use the right amount!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I will say that although it states “fragrance free” there does seem to be a smell to it that smells a little medical. However, the produce itself worked well on my sensitive skin. Out of all of the products I’ve used so far, this has definitely helped maintain PH balance for a small cost.

reviews.reviewText: it was unscented and made her feel fresh. wish i bought another bottle
